fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Freeze your target, roleblocking them and inflicting frostbite.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Ice Shards**
-After roleblocking two people, You may target two people; if either of them die this night, attack the other with a basic attack.
-If you kill two people, your attack is upgraded to powerful.
-If you kill 3 people, you may target four people; if any of them die, kill another person at random.
**Arctic Wind**
-After roleblocking two people, you may roleblock two people as your night action instead.
-After roleblocking four people, you passively roleblock your neighbors every night.
-After roleblocking 10 people, you gain a one time use ability to roleblock everybody in the game that is not a monkey.
__
-You may only choose one upgrade, upgrades are defined in bold.
-Roleblock immune
-“Frostbite” causes them to die if two or more non monkeys visit them in the same night. It doesn’t apply on the night the target was affected, and they are notified they were afflicted by frostbite

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: -Once you upgrade, you lose the ability to inflict frostbite.
